name: Final Fantasy XII International Zodiac Job System
name_original: Final Fantasy XII International Zodiac Job System
description:
Final Fantasy XII International Zodiac Job System is a RPG game developed by Square Enix. It came out on 09-08-2007. It was published by Square Enix. Most rawgers rated the game as "Skip".
You can play Final Fantasy XII International Zodiac Job System on PlayStation 2.
It was produced by Hiroyuki Ito. It was directed by Hiroshi Minagawa and Hiroyuki Ito. It was scored by Hayato Matsuo, Hitoshi Sakimoto and Masaharu Iwata.
